DOC.brief_summary: A controlled, double blinded study to determine the safety and reactogenicity in healthy adults of a single dose of a trivalent cell-derived influenza vaccine administered by intramuscular injection.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of a Cell-Derived Influenza Vaccine in Healthy Adults Aged ≥18 Years and ≤ 49 Years
DOC.criteria: Healthy female or male subjects aged ≧18 and ≦49 years Willing and able to give informed consent Influenza vaccination of laboratory confirmed influenza infection within six months of informed consent, presence of any significant medical condition, a serious adverse reaction after a previous (influenza) vaccination, underlying medical conditions for which annual influenza vaccine is recommended by the Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices (ACIP), chronic diseases requiring longterm immunosuppressive therapy
